name: I Am Cat (Nicholas Andriani)
description: Welcome to I am Neko, an interactive fiction adventure that will take you on a philosophical journey full of profound choices and life-altering decisions. In this game, you play as a curious and adventurous cat, exploring the world and discovering the secrets of life. But this is not just any ordinary game - I am Neko will challenge you to delve deep into the meaning of existence, question the nature of reality, and confront your own beliefs about life and purpose. And if that's not enough, this game also settles the age-old debate about whether rats taste better than mice! You'll have to make the ultimate culinary decision as you navigate through the game's intriguing storyline. So, if you're looking for a thought-provoking adventure that will leave you pondering the mysteries of life, then I am Neko is the game for you. Play now and discover the truth about yourself and the world around you.
